title: Riverboat heritage
creator_contributor_role: Russell Hurley Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/River boats - Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Paddle steamers - Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Paddle steamers - Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/River boats - Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
description: Provides a comprehensive chronological history of the riverboats that travelled the major rivers, particularly the Murray. Portrays the transportation of supplies to inland farmers and goldseekers and the transportation of farm products to the markets of yesteryear. to the service of the tourist trade of today. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
